data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Jing-Xian, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin (2010): Acropimpla Townes from China (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Pimplinae), with key to Chinese fauna and descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 2394: 23-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193926
